pages.heading: Replace a lost or stolen card

content.heading: If your card has a Direct Debit ticket on
content.details: If you’re a Direct Debit Swift card holder you can replace your lost card online.
content.heading2: If your card does not have a Direct Debit ticket on
content.details2: If you do not use Direct Debit to pay for your Swift card, call us on 0345 075 6006 as soon as possible.
content.callHelp: If you need help replacing your card, get in touch.
content.insetText: If you bought your Swift card from National Express, you need to contact them to replace it.
content.warningText: If your enquiry is urgent, please call or chat to us. It will take 2 working days if you use an online form.

pages.heading: Request a refund or cancel your card

content.details: If you’re a Swift card holder you can request a refund and cancel your card online.
content.callHelp: If you need help requesting a refund or cancelling your card, get in touch.

pages.heading: Paying for cycle hire with Swift

content.details: You can pay for cycle hire using the Beryl cycle hire app.
content.details2: If you need help using the cycle hire service through your Swift account, get in touch.

content.details: For all other enquiries please call us or fill in this form.
content.warningText: If your enquiry is urgent, please call or chat to us. It will take 2 working days if you use an online form.

content.heading: Submit an enquiry online
content.details: The West Midlands Metro customer service team is on hand to help if you have any problems. You can submit an enquiry on the West Midlands Metro website.
content.details2: You can also contact West Midlands Metro by phone

content.details: You can view park and ride information including maintenance here.

fields.text: Book a Ring and Ride journey
fields.value: Book a Ring and Ride journey

pages.heading: Book a Ring and Ride journey

content.heading: Book a journey online
content.details: You can book a Ring and Ride journey using the online form.
ringRideInfo: to use this service you need to register online or by phone.
see Ring and Ride fare Prices.
content.callHelp: Call the following number where we will take your details over the phone and advise you on how to start using the service.

content.details: You can request an accessible product online.
content.callHelp: If you need help requesting an accessible product, you can give us a call.

content.details: Read our guidance on how to travel across the network with accessibility needs.
content.callHelp: If you need help with accessible travel, you can give us a call.

fields.text: Report a problem with a bus stop or park and ride
fields.value: Report a problem with a bus stop or park and ride

fields.text: Report an issue with travel information
fields.value: Report an issue with travel information

fields.text: Report an issue with a Payzone shop
fields.value: Report an issue with a Payzone shop

pages.heading: Report a problem with a bus stop or park and ride

content.details: You can report a problem with a bus stop or park and ride online.
content.callHelp: To report an issue with other forms of transport, you’ll need to call us.

pages.heading: Report an issue with travel information

content.details: You can report an issue with travel information at bus stops online.
content.callHelp: To report an issue with travel information on other forms of transport, you’ll need to call us.

pages.heading: Report an issue with a Payzone shop

content.details: Contact us to report an issue with topping up a Swift card at a Payzone shop.
content.callHelp: You can contact Payzone to report other issues with Payzone shops.

pages.heading: Leave feedback or make a complaint

content.details: You can help us improve our services by sending us feedback. This includes suggestions and concerns.
content.details2:
To leave feedback for a bus or train service, you’ll need to contact the operator.

You can leave feedback for tram services on the West Midlands Metro website.
content.callHelp: To leave feedback for anything else, please call us or fill in this form.
content.complaint: If you are dissatisfied with a service and want a response, you can make a complaint online.
content.warningText: If your enquiry is urgent, please call us on the details below.  It can take up to 10 working days for a response if you use the online form.

content.details2: You can also download the application form to print out and send in the post.
content.details3: Find more information about the older person’s pass including eligibility criteria.
content.callHelp: For help with completing your application, call us or fill in this form.

pages.heading: Change my older person’s pass details

content.details: You can update the details on your older person’s pass online.
content.callHelp: If you need help changing the details on your older person’s pass, you can give us a call or chat to us.

content.details: You can renew your older person’s pass online. It’s the easiest way to renew and takes around 15 minutes.
content.details2: You can renew your pass up to 6 weeks before your current one is due to expire.
content.callHelp: If you need help renewing your older person’s pass, you can give us a call or chat to us.

content.details: You can replace your older person’s pass online.
content.details2: If you need help replacing your older person’s pass, you can give us a call.
content.warningText: If your enquiry is urgent, please call or chat to us. It will take 2 working days if you use an online form.

pages.heading: Help with my disabled person’s pass application

content.details: You can apply online for a Disabled Person’s Pass. You can also download an application form to print out and send in the post.
content.details2: It can take us up to 6 weeks to process an application. We’ll be in touch if we need any more information from you.
content.callHelp: If you need help with completing the application, call or chat to us. You can also fill in this form.
